name: Ramblings of the Space Octopus (Discord Jam)
name_original: Ramblings of the Space Octopus (Discord Jam)
description:
Petedrew wandered into the mysterious forest after hearing rumors that the cosmic being known as the Space Octopus had been spotted there. He tracked down the octopus only to find that the forest curse has taken hold, dooming him to mutate until he becomes part of the forest itself.

Control Petedrew in his last moments as he wanders the forest and talks to those he finds there. 6 NPCs and 100+ lines of dialog to find.

Created for Discord Game Jam #5 with the theme of "Mutation".

Controls: 

Move/Select - WASD/Arrows

Talk/Confirm - Space

Main Menu Navigation - Mouse ( sorry bout the inconsistency. last minute control scheme change)
